about_the_game:
Discover the very beginning of the game Magret & FaceDeBouc. The demo gives you the opportunity to play through the entire first part of this point-and-click game, approaching the adventure just as in the original game.

Experience the meeting between the two police inspectors, Magret, the refined duck, and Facedebouc, the cantankerous goat, the beginning of the investigation, and the first main puzzle of the game (alley) before arriving at the crime scene.

A demo that offers roughly 40 to 60 minutes of gameplay and allows you to grasp the gameplay, understand how to control the characters, manipulate objects, and even explore each character's inventory.

content_descriptors.notes: Occasional use of crude and sometimes vulgar language. Crime scene depicting a cartoon-style butchered pig cut into pieces.
